track.name: Red, Red Wine
comments: @MackTheKnifeAU2: I really won't consider it rapping at all. It's still reggae singing.
red red wine im gonna love ya till i die
i can never get tired of this song.

what kind of red wine is he singing about? merlot? shiraz? cabernet? one of life's big questions to ponder. haha
I remember when this song was everywhere, great for a sing along.. I wonder if they were a few sheets to the wind when they recorded it cause some times they sound a bit slurry lol
